<script lang="ts">
import { pick } from "svelte-legos";
import { writable } from "svelte/store";

const data = writable({
	name: "Svelte",
	author: "Rich",
	createdAt: Date.now(),
});

const name = pick(data, "name"); // $name => "Svelte"

const nameAndAuthor = pick(data, "name", "author");
// $nameAndCreatedAt => { name: "Svelte", author: "Rich" }

</script>
